column2: bizobbob, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Suffered for years (10) with what I thought was dry skin on my feet. Tried it all. Had settled on soaking and scraping every couple of weeks. What a mess. Went to the podiatrist for a case of plantar fasisitits last year. She took one look at my feed, said you got athlete's foot. Prescribed NAFTIN for a one month treatment. Results were instantaneous. Had new feet in within couple of days. $200 a 90g tube(GEL) only $20 to me with insurance. I swear by this stuff . Don't waste your time with vinegar, vicks, listorine ect. ect. Old wifes tales.

column2: Jon_Brooklyn, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Had a horrible case of foot fungus that I lived with for 2 years. No over the counter cream could cure this. Within one week of use I wiped out the fungus restoring my feet back to normal.

column2: 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: Slow developing toenail fungus that started near the nail bed of my big toe turning the nail white from bed to nail tip. Both Naftin cream and anti-fungal powder was rubbed into the nail each once daily. It took weeks before normal nail was seen growing again. The bad nail has almost grown out 10 months later.

column2: Lee09, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Had fungal "rash" around nose and mouth for several months.  I tried every natural treatment available.  The dermatologist prescribed me Naftin cream, to be used twice a day.  After a couple days I almost stopped using it because it seemed it was getting worse, but I kept using it as I have heard about fungus die off and that it can get worse before getting better. I am VERY happy I kept using it.  Now, one week later, my skin is 95% better and I can be seen in public again without embarrassment! I would recommend this cream to anyone with a fungal problem.  Remember, keep using it even if it seems like it's getting worse!!!! I also used emu oil at night, as I heard it is anti fungal and can help the medicine penetrate deeper.  I never post reviews on medicines, but this one is amazing!!!! I'm so thankful the Dr. told me about it...
